short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Chrome extension that tells you what L(A)Inus thinks about your YouTube videos

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Are you tired of actually watching youtube videos?
Are you more the kind of "please just tell me the right opinion"-person?

Then this extension is the tool you have been missing all your life!

Why bother watching a video creators' passionate work when you can just have it summed up by an LLM pretending to be Linus Sebastian, only taking the video title and the top 30 comments into account. 

The best thing about that: Every message comes with a free ad for lttstore.com!

Rejoice as the new age of internet technology has arrived.






Similar to how imitation is the sincerest flattery, this extension is meant as harmless banter and in no way supposed to be perceived as defamatory ridicule.
Linus rocks.

Depending on reception more options/functionalities/persons of interest may be added later on in updates.

*** The extension was not behaving properly between May and July 2024, v.0.0.3 fixes that issue
